results.abstract: The West Virginia Democrat said he had relented and agreed to sign on to a climate, energy and tax package after returning to negotiations to draft a version that would combat inflation.

multimedia.caption: Senator Joe Manchin III had been the chief Democratic holdout on the package.

results.title: After Clash, Manchin and Schumer Rushed to Reset Climate and Tax Deal

results.abstract: Legislation agreed to by top Democrats falls far short of closing a tax loophole that party leaders have complained about for years but would narrow its preferential treatment.
results.byline: By Alan Rappeport and Emily Flitter

multimedia.caption: Senators Joe Manchin, left, and Chuck Schumer reached an agreement this week that would take a small step toward narrowing the carried interest loophole.

results.title: Carried Interest Is Back in the Headlines. What Would a New Tax Proposal Do?
